program.name: cmake
program.script-header:
# These need to be set at bootstrap (configure) time, when the # Makefiles are generated, and also at build time, when the # Makefiles are re-generated by the real cmake. CMAKE_INCLUDE_PATH="${SB_VAR_NCURSES+${SB_VAR_NCURSES_INC}}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBQT+:${SB_VAR_LIBQT_INC}}\ ${SB_VAR_CURL+:${SB_VAR_CURL_INC}}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBEXPAT+:${SB_VAR_LIBEXPAT_INC}}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL+:${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL_INC}}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBZ+:${SB_VAR_LIBZ_INC}}\ ${SB_VAR_BZIP2+:${SB_VAR_BZIP2_INC}}" CMAKE_LIBRARY_PATH="${SB_VAR_NCURSES+${SB_VAR_NCURSES_LIB}}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBQT+:${SB_VAR_LIBQT_LIB}}\ ${SB_VAR_CURL+:${SB_VAR_CURL_LIB}}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBEXPAT+:${SB_VAR_LIBEXPAT_LIB}}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL+:${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL_LIB}}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBZ+:${SB_VAR_LIBZ_LIB}}\ ${SB_VAR_BZIP2+:${SB_VAR_BZIP2_LIB}}\ ${SB_VAR_GCC_RT+:${SB_VAR_GCC_RT_LIB}}" CMAKE_INSTALL_RPATH="${SB_VAR_NCURSES+${SB_VAR_NCURSES_LIB}}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBQT+;${SB_VAR_LIBQT_LIB}}\ ${SB_VAR_CURL+;${SB_VAR_CURL_LIB}}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBEXPAT+;${SB_VAR_LIBEXPAT_LIB}}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL+;${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL_LIB}}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBZ+;${SB_VAR_LIBZ_LIB}}\ ${SB_VAR_BZIP2+;${SB_VAR_BZIP2_LIB}}\ ${SB_VAR_GCC_RT+;${SB_VAR_GCC_RT_LIB}}" CMAKE_INSTALL_RPATH="${CMAKE_INSTALL_RPATH+${CMAKE_INSTALL_RPATH};}\ ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX_LIB}" CURSES_INCLUDE_PATH="${SB_VAR_NCURSES+${SB_VAR_NCURSES_INC}}" export CMAKE_INCLUDE_PATH CMAKE_LIBRARY_PATH CMAKE_INSTALL_RPATH \ CURSES_INCLUDE_PATH
_datadir="${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/share" _docdir="${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/doc"
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qro -qroconst -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=ppc" CXX=xlC CXXFLAGS="-O2 -qro -qroconst -qnotempinc \ -qnotemplateregistry -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=ppc" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-blibpath:" ;; ia64*-hpux11.31) CC=cc CFLAGS="-z +O2 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +Oentrysched \ +Odataprefetch +Onolimit -mt"
# +Oentrysched causes two test failures CXX=aCC CXXFLAGS="-z -AA +O2 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +Odataprefetch \ +Onolimit -mt" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+b," ;; ia64*-hpux11.23) CC=cc CFLAGS="-z +O2 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +Oentrysched \ +Odataprefetch +Onolimit -mt"
# +Oentrysched causes two test failures # +O2 compile seems to take too long for cmBootstrapCommands.cxx CXX=aCC CXXFLAGS="-z -AA +O1 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +Odataprefetch \ +Onolimit -mt" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+b," ;; *-hpux11.[01]*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-z +O2 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit"
# +Oentrysched causes the following build failure: # Warning: Entry/Exit code is optimized. Cannot restore context (UNWIND 22) CXX=aCC CXXFLAGS="-z -AA +O2 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +DAportable \ +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b," ;; *-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-z +O2 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +Oentrysched \ +Odataprefetch +Onolimit"
# +Oentrysched causes the following build failure: # Warning: Entry/Exit code is optimized. Cannot restore context (UNWIND 22) CXX=aCC CXXFLAGS="-z -AA +O2 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +Odataprefetch \ +Onolimit" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b," ;; *-irix*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1009,1429 \ -use_readonly_const -G0 -rdata_shared -DEBUG:optimize_space=ON \ -O2 -OPT:Olimit=0" CXX=CC CXXFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1429 \ -use_readonly_const -G0 -rdata_shared -DEBUG:optimize_space=ON \ -ptused -FE:template_in_elf_section -O2 -OPT:Olimit=0" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; i?86*-linux*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=pentiumpro -march=pentiumpro" CXXFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=pentiumpro -march=pentiumpro" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-linux*) CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -arch ev5 -ieee -msym -readonly_strings" CXX=cxx CXXFLAGS="-O2 -arch ev5 -msym -readonly_strings \ -timplicit_local" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; i?86*-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=pentium4" CXX=CC CXXFLAGS="-xO2 -xtarget=pentium4" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; *-solaris2.8) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 \ -xarch=v8plusa" CXX=CC CXXFLAGS="-xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 -xarch=v8plusa" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; *-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 \ -m32 -xarch=sparcvis" CXX=CC CXXFLAGS="-xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 -m32 -xarch=sparcvis" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; esac
program.configure:
# Make script executable to be used for AIX builds ${SB_PATH_CHMOD} +x cmake-get-exported-symbols-aix export PATH="${SB_BUILD_PREFIX}:$PATH"
CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ CXX="${CXX:-g++}" CXXFLAGS="${CXXFLAGS:--O2}" \ CPPFLAGS="${SB_VAR_NCURSES+-I${SB_VAR_NCURSES_INC}} \ ${SB_VAR_LIBQT+-I${SB_VAR_LIBQT_INC}} ${CPPFLAGS+${CPPFLAGS}}" \ LDFLAGS="${SB_VAR_NCURSES+-L${SB_VAR_NCURSES_LIB}} \ ${SB_VAR_LIBQT+-L${SB_VAR_LIBQT_LIB}} \ ${SB_VAR_GCC_RT+-L${SB_VAR_GCC_RT_LIB}} ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" \ ${SHELL} ./bootstrap --datadir=${_datadir##${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}} \ --system-libs --docdir=${_docdir##${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}} --verbose \ --no-system-libarchive \ ${SB_VAR_LIBQT+--qt-gui} \ ${ARGS+${ARGS}} --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}
program.test:
CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS=${CXXFLAGS:--O2} \ PATH="${SB_BUILD_PREFIX}:$PATH" gmake test VERBOSE=1
: ignore testsuite failures
